attributes.action: Ensure Last Night of the Proms upholds tradition
attributes.additional_details: British tradition is sacrosanct to many voiceless people in this country. We are still the majority yet our voices are neither being heard or heeded. The choice of music should not be subject to the whim of visiting conductors or guest singers.
attributes.background: Make it plain that the BBC is a quintessentially British corporation, paid for by the licence payers of this country.

rejection.details:
If you would like to submit a complaint, you can do so using the link below:

http://www.bbc.co.uk/complaints/
